      It will test the given Order on Customer Test rules: Customer Name - is not Blank If any fail, an exception is given

      It will test the given Order on Product Test rules: Product Type - in given Products.txt.

      It will test the given Order on State Test rules: State - in given Taxes.txt.

      Used to write all the orders in Files/Orders dir to a single Backup .txt file
